IAeProcessStateConnectionProvider, IAeStorageProvider, IAeXMLDBStorage
public class AeXMLDBProcessStateConnectionProvider
extends AeAbstractXMLDBStorageConnectionProvider
implements IAeProcessStateConnectionProvider

A XMLDB implementation of a process state connection provider.

buildLongIdSetWhereClause

protected java.lang.String buildLongIdSetWhereClause(AeLongSet aLongIds,
                                                     java.lang.String aParamName)
Creates the WHERE clause for the delete query that will remove all of the entries in the given set. The WHERE clause is to delete journal entries as well as completed transmission ids.

Parameters:
aLongIds -
